briefdescription.para: This is the list of the measurement we can access.

detaileddescription.para: Motor board is the board with the motors for the planarizer leg. This board must e flashed with the proper firmware.
Encoder board 1 is the board with the planarizer yaw and pitch joints encoders. Index 0 will be pitch and index 1 is yaw.
Encoder board 2 is the board with the boom connector joint. Index 0 is where encoder should be located
this shows the number of boards when converteed to an int.

briefdescription.para: This is the list of the measurement we can access.

detaileddescription.para: Current for the hip joint
Current for the knee joint
This shows the number of current targets when converteed to an int.

briefdescription.para: This is the list of the controls we can send.

detaileddescription.para:
Getters
index
is the kind of measurement we are looking for.
Ptr<const ScalarTimeseries> is the list of the last time stamped measurement acquiered.

briefdescription.para: Get the status of one of the boards.

parameterdescription.para: the kind of status we are interested in.

simplesect.para: Ptr<const StatusTimeseries> is the list of the last status of the card.

briefdescription.para: Get the controls to be send.

detaileddescription.para:
input logs
index
define the kind of control we are looking for.
Ptr<const ScalarTimeseries> is the list of the controls to be send.

briefdescription.para: Get the commands to be send.

simplesect.para: Ptr<const CommandTimeseries> is the list of the commands to be send.

parameterdescription.para: define the kind of control we are looking for.

simplesect.para: Ptr<const ScalarTimeseries> is the list of the controls sent recently.
Ptr<const CommandTimeseries> is the list of the commands sent recently.

briefdescription.para: Set a board to an active state if it is not already active. This means the board will now have its status checked for is_ready and if the board is the motor_board we must send enable the motors etc.

detaileddescription.para:
Setters
index

briefdescription.para: set_control save the control internally. In order to actaully send the controls to the network please call "send_if_input_changed"

parameterdescription.para: is the value of the control.
define the kind of control we want to send.

briefdescription.para: set_command save the command internally. In order to actaully send the controls to the network please call "send_if_input_changed"

parameterdescription.para: is the command to be sent.

briefdescription.para: Actually send the commands and the controls.
returns only once board and motors are ready.

detaileddescription.para: This will cause the control to be forced into a "safemode" where the control is set to zero then held constant until reset.
This will return if the control is in "safemode".

This will cause the control to reset the "safemode" if the control is currently in safemode. Additionally the motors will be paused and The control boards will be reset such that any timed out connection will be reestablished.

briefdescription.para: ControlBoardsInterface declares an API to inacte with a ControlBoards.
